department.dept_long_name: Department of Organismic and Evolutionary Biology

course.title: Research in Comparative Biomechanics: Seminar
course.faculty_text: Andrew A. Biewener, Stacey A. Combes, George V. Lauder, and Anna G. Warrener
course.description: Introduces students to experimental techniques used to investigate the structure and physiology of animals. Each instructor offers research projects that are undertaken in their laboratory (limit 5 students per instructor). Students meet to introduce their project, discuss their work and progress, and to present their final results. An extensive commitment of time in the laboratory is required. Grades are based on the work completed, the oral presentation, and a short research paper.
